author: Special Correspondent
text: Over 50 passengers of a private bus proceeding towards Aruppukottai had a providential escape when fire engulfed the vehicle near Kariyapatti in Virudhunagar district on Thursday evening. Police said the driver noticed thick smoke gushing out on the rear side around 4 p.m. The crew members asked the passengers to get down immediately. Fire and Rescue Services personnel fought for nearly two hours to put out the fire.
title: Bus goes up in flames
